QuestData.Title: Natural Antiseptic
QuestData.Description: The Shado-Pan are rare, elite, and quite expensive to train and replace. We can't afford to have any falling to a poisoned weapon or an infected cut. That's why I need you to get... something.$b$bLet me be blunt. Mushan urine is a great, natural antiseptic. They produce a large amount of it, which is lucky... because we tend to use a lot.
QuestData.CompletionText: It's messy work, certainly.$b$bNowhere near as messy as digging graves.
QuestData.RewardText: Your messy work may have saved a few lives today, $r.
